name: Financial System Simulator
short_description:
Financial System Simulator demonstrates in a very simple way how our financial System works and how it creates Money.
Shows its good and bad side-effects and possible solutions.

Visit the Homepage of this Project to play around or download the Simulation.
Feel free to extend the Javascript Code.

With Version 4 Simulations can be saved on a Server. This needs a Webserver with MySQL and PHP5.3+Kohana Framework.
summary: Shows how Money is created, interest side-effects and solutions
